Structs/TransactionContext.html#/s:9TSHP.name: aid

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Error.h.name: transmissionError
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Error.h.abstract: Error encountered in APDU exchange between device and POS reader.

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Error.h.name: sessionInvalidated
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Error.h.abstract: The card session has been invalidated by system

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Error.h.name: setDefaultCardFailure
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Error.h.abstract: Error encountered in set provided Digital Card ID as default card when startPayment(withDigitalCardID:)

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Error.h.name: authenticationExpired
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Error.h.abstract: Error encountered when payment made after validation of authentication

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Error.h.name: posNotSupported
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Error.h.abstract: Error encountered when POS do not have selected AID in the list

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Error.h.name: cardNotSupported
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Error.h.abstract: The card is not supported for Contactless Payment

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Eligibi.name: deviceNotSupported(_:)
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Eligibi.abstract: Device does not have NFC tag reading (e.g. iPad) or HCE capability.

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Eligibi.name: systemNotEligible
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Eligibi.abstract: System is not eligible due to device is not in EEA (European Economic

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Eligibi.name: iosVersionNotSupported(_:)
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Eligibi.abstract: iOS version installed on the device is lower than 17.4,

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession.html#/s.name: requestAuthorization()
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession.html#/s.abstract: Request authorization from user to allow NFC usage.

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession.html#/s.name: startEmulation()
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession.html#/s.abstract: Start the card emulation and presents a modal user interface to user.

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession.html#/s.name: eventStream
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession.html#/s.abstract: An asynchronous sequence of events from contactless payment transaction.

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession.html#/s.name: setAlertMessage(_:)
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession.html#/s.abstract: A message to show on the NFC action sheet.

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Eligibi.name: Eligibility
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession/Eligibi.abstract: The device eligibility whether it supports contactless payment.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.name: digitizationApproved(_:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.abstract: The state returned when DigitalCard is ready for green flow.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.name: digitizationDeclined
Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.abstract: The state returned when digitization is declined for red flow.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.name: digitizationApprovedWithIDV(_:_:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.abstract: The state returned when DigitalCard is digitized for yellow flow. The cardholder’s identity verfication is required to complete the digitization flow. Cardholder is required to select an IDV method.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.name: activationRequired(_:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.abstract: The state that is returned when the IDV method has been selected by the cardholder. MPA will proceed with the card activation based on the IDV method selected and the state of the pending activation.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.name: invalidInput(_:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.abstract: This state is returned when there is an invalid input.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.name: cancelled
Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.abstract: The state returned when the digitization flow has been cancelled.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.name: activatedByIDV(_:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.abstract: The state returned when cardholder’s identity verfication is sucessfully completed.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.name: errorEncountered(_:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.abstract: The state that is returned when the digitization flow encounters an error.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IssuerDat.name: phoneNumber
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IssuerDat.abstract: The phone number of the customer service and support.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IssuerDat.name: website
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IssuerDat.abstract: The URL for customer service and support.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IssuerDat.name: email
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IssuerDat.abstract: The email address of the customer service and support.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Instrumen.name: init(scheme:payload:type:version:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Instrumen.abstract: Initializes InstrumentDataComponents with scheme, type, version and push receipt payload.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: line1
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: The address at which the cardholder resides.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: line2
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: Additional line for the address at which the cardholder resides.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: city
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: The city in which the cardholder resides.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: state
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: The state in which the cardholder resides.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: country
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: The country in which the cardholder resides.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: Address
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: Address The residing address of the cardholder.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: bankApp
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: Card details were provided through the bank app.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: manual
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: Card details were provided via manual input.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: ocr
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: Card details were provided via Optical Character Recognition.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: InputMethod
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: InputMethod contains the input method used to capture the card information.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: WalletAccount
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: WalletAccount contains the information related to the end user’s wallet account. This information is only used by the issuer or scheme to assess the risk during the eligibility check and card provisioning process.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: state()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Fetches the state of the pending card activation.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: cardArt()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Fetches the card art of the pending card for display purpose.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: cardMetaData()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Fetches the card MetaData of the pending card.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: resume()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Resumes the activation process.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: cancel()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Cancels the pending card activation.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: appToAppSelected(requestPayload:scheme:source:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: App to app authentication is selected.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: idvMethodNotSelected
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: No IDV Method has been selected. MPA must proceed to select IDV method first.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: otpNeeded
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: OTP is required. MPA will request the end user to enter the OTP for activation.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: aborted
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Pending activation is aborted and card is deleted on the backend.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: state()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Fetches the state of the pending card activation.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: cardArt()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Fetches the card art of the pending card for display purpose.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: cardMetaData()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Fetches the card metadata of the pending card.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: invokeIDVSelection()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Invokes the selection of the IDV method.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: cancel()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Cancels the pending card activation.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: activate(withOTP:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Activates the card using the OTP received.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: resumeAppToAppActivation()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Resumes the app-to-app activation process.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: resumeAppToAppActivation(withTAV:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: Resumes the app-to-app activation process with TAV.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: State
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: The state of pending card activation.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.name: plainText
Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.abstract: Term and Condition received plain text type from response

Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.name: html
Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.abstract: Term and Condition received html Text type from response

Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.name: pdf
Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.abstract: Term and Condition received PDF type from response

Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.name: other
Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.abstract: Other type, for any unlnown type we have to handle here.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.name: description
Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.abstract: A localized message describing the error that occurred.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.name: accept()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.abstract: Accepts the terms and condition to allow the card digitization process.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.name: select(idvID:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.abstract: Selects the type of IDV method to be used for card activation.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.name: cancel()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.abstract: Cancels the IDV selection. It terminates the digitization process and MPA is required to start from eligibility check in order to restart the digitization process.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.name: getIDVMethodList()
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.abstract: Returns the list of available IDV methods.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.name: otpBySMS
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.abstract: Obtain One-Time-Password through SMS to registerd mobile phone number.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.name: other
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.abstract: Other type, please check for typeDescription for more information.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.name: id
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.abstract: IDV Method unique identifier. Selection of IDV method is based on this ID.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.name: typeDescription
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.abstract: String representation of the IDV method type.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.name: isOTPRequired
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.abstract: Whether or not this IDV Method requires an OTP.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/DigitizeE.name: cardStateDoesNotAllowRequestedOperation
Actors/CardDigitizationService/DigitizeE.abstract: Card State not Allow for Requested Operation

Actors/CardDigitizationService/DigitizeE.name: description
Actors/CardDigitizationService/DigitizeE.abstract: A localized message describing the error that occurred.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/EligibleE.name: cardProductNotSupported
Actors/CardDigitizationService/EligibleE.abstract: This type of Card product not supported

Actors/CardDigitizationService/EligibleE.name: cardAlreadyProvisionedInWallet
Actors/CardDigitizationService/EligibleE.abstract: This Card is already provisioned in the wallet

Actors/CardDigitizationService/EligibleE.name: exceedCountForCardProvisioning
Actors/CardDigitizationService/EligibleE.abstract: This card has exceeded the number of times it can be provisioned

Actors/CardDigitizationService/EligibleE.name: description
Actors/CardDigitizationService/EligibleE.abstract: A localized message describing the error that occurred.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Error.htm.name: description
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Error.htm.abstract: A localized message describing the error that occurred.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: termsAndConditions
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: The Contents of the Terms and Conditions.

Actors/CardDigitizationService.html#/s:9.name: checkEligibility(_:instrumentData:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService.html#/s:9.abstract: Performs an eligibility check on the card before digitization.

Actors/CardDigitizationService.html#/s:9.name: getPendingCardActivationSession(forDigitalCardID:)
Actors/CardDigitizationService.html#/s:9.abstract: Returns the PendingCardActivationSession object. It is used to resume the card activation process.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.name: IDVMethod
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.abstract: The different verification/authentication methods used to verify the cardholder’s identify.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.name: IDVMethodSelector
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IDVMethod.abstract: The object used to list and select IDV method for card activation.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.name: TermsAndConditions
Actors/CardDigitizationService/TermsAndC.abstract: TermsAndConditions provides the contents in the Terms and Conditions and the option to accept it.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: PendingCardActivation
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: PendingCardActivation indicates the card which was previously interrupted during activation.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.name: PendingCardActivationSession
Actors/CardDigitizationService/PendingCa.abstract: PendingCardActivationSession indicates the card which the Id&V has not been performed.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.name: EligibilityData
Actors/CardDigitizationService/Eligibili.abstract: EligibilityData is used by MPA to provide information associated with the card digitization.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/IssuerDat.name: IssuerData
Actors/CardDigitizationService/IssuerDat.abstract: IssuerData contains the information of the issuer.

Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.name: State
Actors/CardDigitizationService/State.htm.abstract: State of the card digitization process that is initiated with digitizeCard(withTNC:pushToken:language:authenticationToken:)

Actors/CardDigitizationService.html#/s:9.name: TermsAndConditionsSession
Actors/CardDigitizationService.html#/s:9.abstract: TermsAndConditionsSession provides the correlation ID and timestamp of the session.

Actors/CardDigitizationService.html.name: CardDigitizationService
Actors/CardDigitizationService.html.abstract: This service is used to digitize and enrol a card.

Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession.html.name: ContactlessPaymentSession
Actors/ContactlessPaymentSession.html.abstract: Class to manage and perform contactless payment transaction.

Actors/RemotePaymentSession.html.name: RemotePaymentSession
Actors/RemotePaymentSession.html.abstract: The RemotePaymentSession provides an API to support remote payment.

Actors/DigitalCardManager.html.name: DigitalCardManager
Actors/DigitalCardManager.html.abstract: Gives access to the list of available digitalCards, obtaining a specified digitalCard, retrieving the default payment card and unsetting the default status of a card.

Actors/WalletSecureEnrollmentService.htm.name: WalletSecureEnrollmentService
Actors/WalletSecureEnrollmentService.htm.abstract: Wallet secure enrollment service is used to seurely enroll the wallet and download the required assets.

Actors/NotificationService.html.name: NotificationService
Actors/NotificationService.html.abstract: This service provides an AsyncStream callback mechanism for processing notifications.

Actors/ODARenewalService.html.name: ODARenewalService
Actors/ODARenewalService.html.abstract: This service is used to perform the ODA certificate renewal in the card.

Actors/QRPaymentSession.html.name: QRPaymentSession
Actors/QRPaymentSession.html.abstract: QRPaymentSession class to generate QR payment data for PURE QR based payments.

Actors/ReplenishmentService.html.name: ReplenishmentService
Actors/ReplenishmentService.html.abstract: A class to manage the replenishment service.
